评论详情: Key Features 1. Soft, Breathable Fabric: Made of a 60% polyester, 35% cotton, and 5% spandex blend, this tee offers lightweight, breathable, and durable comfort. Its skin-friendly fabric ensures all-day coziness, making it perfect for summer heat or layered for cooler weather.  2. Relaxed Timeless Design: The crew neck and rolled short sleeves bring a casual yet stylish vibe, while the loose fit and curved hem provide a flattering silhouette. Bonus points for the long length that covers your hips and provides excellent coverage!  3. Endless Versatility: This oversized tee is a wardrobe hero:  Tuck it into jeans or shorts for an effortless summer look. Pair it with leggings for a sporty, athleisure outfit. Layer it with a jacket in cooler months for a chic, casual vibe. 4. Fits All Occasions: Ideal for everything from lounging at home to heading out for errands, workouts, or casual dates. Whether you're traveling, working, or playing basketball, this tee has got you covered.  Why Choose This Oversized T-Shirt? It’s all about effortless style meets ultimate comfort. The soft fabric, stylish design, and versatility make this a standout staple for every season.  Final Thoughts The Totatuit Oversized T-Shirt is the epitome of comfort and chic. Whether you're dressing it up or down, it’s perfect for creating relaxed yet polished looks. It’s a go-to choice for casual wear and versatile enough to adapt to almost any outfit or occasion.  💡 Pro Tip: Pair it with your favorite sneakers for a sporty vibe or accessorize with a belt for an elevated look!  This tee is more than just basic—it’s a must-have for every wardrobe!

评论概述: Simple, but I really like it!
评论详情: This is a pretty basic top, but I'm finding it harder & harder to find a comfy/everyday/moderately oversized shirt that I actually like- but I'm happy to say I've got one here. It's lightweight & breathable, and definitely roomy, but with a more feminine cut so you don't feel like a slob wearing it out. It looks good partially tucked or not tucked at all. The rolled sleeves stay in place nicely after washing too, and I didn't notice any significant shrinkage. The color also looks exactly the same in person as it does online, I love that it's a neutral, muted tone but I still get a pop of color. But what I love most about it is that fact that it's priced at $9.99! I didn't think such a reasonable price existed anymore!

For the price, this is really a nice comfortable shirt.  Sister was impressed with what i got her for Christmas as she loves this type of shirt.  The dark pink was between lavender and pink, well that's what she said.  She liked it and said it's real comfortable.  The size was big on her, but that was the intention anyway.After the first wash, shirt hasn't fallen apart and she seems to be wearing it a lot since

评论概述: Nice LARGE Workout shirt, and Lounging apparel.
评论详情: The "Oversized" part is dead on correct.  If you want something extra-casual, and non-form fitting that you probably see yourself not leaving the house with, then this is it.-  Ordered Wine Red, and it is more like Bland Peach.-  The material is medium thickness, so if you want something that you can sweat in, this is it.My wife is 5'4", and 116 lbs.  As a 34C, she wears a common Medium.  We ordered Medium, and it is giant on her.  That said, if you are a larger American/European woman, then I believe that Medium might be more appropriate for you.  I would be afraid to see what Large looks like, tbh.The material is nice, and soft, and my wife says that she is going to put it to use, perhaps using it as a shorter dress, with a longer skirt.  I didn't include a picture because to me it kind of looks like pajamas.

This Totatuit Oversized shirt is most definitely oversized. I would have sized down if I knew the top was this big. It pretty much swallows me. The arm holes are huge. The shirt itself is a nice lightweight material that is stretchy. It's just too big. It washed well on cold and I hung it to dry with no problems.

Totally works as your comfy lounge or quick grab shirt. The fabric is soft-ish: thick enough to cover and hold its shape, but soft enough to drape and feel good. The color is beautiful saturated, but more blue-green than the photo shows. The only con is the itchy side tag. :) Recommend.

I ordered this top for my wife. She likes an oversized tshirt style for working out. And this is perfect. The oversized look isn’t boxy and is cute and flattering. The material is soft and breathable.  She enjoys working out in this shirt.  You can style it with a knot at the side for a more fitted look.  It washed really well and didn’t shrink at all.  Great shirt!

I love this shirt. The color was true to the description and very pretty. It’s a quality, thick (but not too thick) material. I am confident I’ll be able to dress it up or down and feel comfortable and cute! I like it and definitely recommend it to others.

I think I'm giving up on ordering clothes online. I got the XX-large, and it fits like a slightly larger X-Large. The shoulder seams are a little too high up on the shoulder, and while the length of the tshirt is good, it still clings in all the wrong spots. Plus the color is more pale berry than what is shown on the screen. The neck is a little too high and the thickness of the fabric is 1/2 ply. It's good to have for the summer or if you're going to the beach. It'll dry instantly.

This is a nice, quality T-shirt for everyday casual wear. Despite being mixed, the material feels quite cotton-y to the touch. Fit is TTS and very comfortable. Not see-through at all! I love the length of it, too. Great quality at this price point, so I recommend it!
This tee is super comfortable!  It basically fits me like a men's XL does.  The shirt washes and drives well, without shrinking or fading.  I would definitely recommend this product!

The item description said Oversized Tshirt, so I believed them and ordered a size smaller than usual.  Really glad I did, because even the size down is still REALLY big.  The fabric is a little on the thin side, which is nice for workout clothes. You don't want something heavy for that.  It is a tiny bit stretchy, but since it's oversized, not sure why I need that.  I just threw it on right out of the package, but still like the look and feel.  I wish I had ordered two sizes down, but this is still nice enough to keep.
Great, oversized shirt. Material is soft and thick. Beautiful Camel-like color. Perfect with leggings!

This is just what I was looking for.  It is oversized as advertised.  Good material--soft to the touch and comfortable.  The color is an attractive subtle pink/purple.  It will be perfect for layering while I travel to different temperature zones.  I'm thinking about ordering other colors, as well.

评论概述: Definitely oversized.. so look at sizing
评论详情: Nice basic t-shirt. It is oversized. Should have trusted the sizing and went with a large. Still I'll wear it as it's the perfect lounging shirt. It's a soft, but not bunny soft t-shirt material. Good price. Remember it's BIG when ordering. It is a great deal for a good shirt.

This is a nice oversized shirt. It fits well and feels like it’s made with high quality fabrics. I was able to wash and dry it with no issues. The shirt is soft and light without being too thin. This is a great everyday top and a must have wardrobe piece.

This is an oversized top so I'm glad I sized down. The sleeves are a little longer than I would normally like a shirt to be so I'm going to wear this as a hiking or gym top. It's very comfortable, loose and very forgiving when it comes to giving your tummy that full coverage. I have my bloating days so during those times, I prefer very large shirts. I'm 5'5" 135' lbs and ordered a S.
Love it! Perfect, not too tight fit. Didn't shrink when washed on cold and tumble dried. The fabric is super soft. I did size up to wear with leggings and it's perfect.
Good over sized fit.  Long and flows down the bottom.  The sleeves are long enough to turn up once.  Washes up well and dries with no touch up needed.

really like this shirt.  its soft, and comfortable. it washed well.  the color of the dark pink is nice. i'm 5'10 and a 14/16 and the XL fit as the photo shows, longer and a bit oversized.  great shirt for workouts or running around.
Very well constructed using good material. Feels very soft next to the skin. Lovely color fit is great true to size. Washed and dried nicely.
My wife likes this shirt. Loose-fitting but not baggy.
Is perfect! I love the color, I love the material! My daughter says that is very breathable and very light. Absolutely not see through. Soft color and can wear every season.

The Totatuit Oversized t-shirt is really big. It's also formless and unflattering. It is a good choice paired with leggings, but that's about it. The material is okay, though not overly soft. It has the type of material that looks like it will pill over time. Also, the tan color really shows sweat/moisture easily. Not a good choice for warm temperatures. My wife does like the folded sleeves and the stitching is decent, but it's an average shirt at best. I got Large for my size 12 curvy wife, true to size for an "oversized" t-shirt I suppose.  ~ Kort

This oversized t-shirt in a lovely pink shade is well-made and perfect for casual lounging. The material is a standard t-shirt weight—not super light, but breathable due to its loose fit rather than the fabric itself. It washed well, which is always a plus.  Unfortunately, the fit wasn’t for me. The sleeves fell past my elbows, making the rolled cuffs feel heavy, and the crew neck sat too high, causing me to constantly adjust it. To be fair, I sized up to an XL instead of my usual large, which may have contributed to the fit issues. Still, it just didn’t feel as comfortable as I had hoped, and I’m unlikely to reach for it often.
